EmailTemplate.name: 08-16-21 HOSP Pre Survey Email.NBO Prod Pre Survey Email
EmailTemplate.subject: You Inspire Our Innovations!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
At NCR, we're always doing our best to expand the products and services we offer and would love to hear your feedback.
Make an impact by participating in a quick survey about your experience with NCR Back Office. This is a great opportunity to influence the future of NCR solutions!
Your invitation for this survey will arrive in a separate email from the NCR Product Team <product.team@feedback.ncr.com> and we promise it won't take too much of your time.
Thanks in advance for your help. We couldn't keep innovating without you!
